channel.title: Works on KENTO-Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Works on KENTO-Portfolio

item.title: Project
item.description:
VR / Metaverse Platform Worked on the development of the Metaverse platform for one year as a VR engineer. Illumination Diving Supported for enhancing AR content with GPU instancing.
Immersive Battle Helped with a mobile application.
NEUU AR I created a dedicated AR app completely from scratch.
COCOAR COCOAR is a platform to publish original AR contents. As a side business, I created AR contents that works on COCOAR.

item.title: Hackathon & Contest
item.description:
I often participate hackathon and contest. I like the new technology, especially XR and Unity. And when I participate, I try to use the new technology. withAR Ã— Shinjuku I developed a system which is able to communicate VR and AR in this hackathon. Finally, I won the hackathon.
GeoSpatial Hackathon I suggested to apply to this hackathon in the company that I work for. The key feature of this hackathon is GeoSpatialAPI.

item.title: 1week gamejam
item.description: I have participated the 1week gamejam called unity1week. This event is a good opportunity to learn new skills.

item.title: Presentation
item.description:
I often try to give a presentation when I acquire new skills or new challenge. CA.Unity #5 I gave a presentation about the project architecture of STYLY.
PLATEAU LT 01 I gave a presentation about new feature of STYLY.
Roppongi.unity #9 I gave a presentation about translation system in VR.
FGDC study meeting vol.10 I tested the voice recognition feature in MetaQuest. And I gave a presentation in VR space called XRCLOUD.

item.title: Technical article
item.description: I won’t hesitate to publish the article. I believe that I’m sure it will be useful to someone. Another reason is that I want to keep a record of my growth. I am not a special person, and my growth will encourage others to work towards their goals.

item.title: Shader article
item.description: I write down Shader I learn. A goal is 100 articles.

item.title: The minimum tips
item.description: I write down the minimum tips in English.
